entry.title: 6" x 10 Yards Black Glitter Tulle Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5220
Type: Tulle
Price: 2.19

[About]

Material: 100% Nylon Material
Width of Fabric: 6" Wide
Length of Fabric: 10 Yards
Color: Black
Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Add a dash of shine and sparkle into your party and favor decorations with our mesmeric 6" x 10 Yards Black Glitter Tulle Fabric Bolt that is crafted to meet the swish decorative needs of all fashionistas out there! With the peerless sheerness of delicate tulle fabric augmented manifold by the shiny glitter dots sprinkled throughout the fabric this epitome of glimmer and glamour is fashioned to create bedazzling decorative accents. Pep up your decorations, centerpieces, vases, favors, baskets, bows, and other arts and crafts by adding oodles of glitz and glam exuded by our breathtakingly mesmerizing lustrous tulle fabric!

Additional Information:

  • Material: 100% Nylon Material
  • Width of Fabric: 6" Wide 
  • Length of Fabric: 10 Yards 
  • Color: Black
  • Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
  • The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
  • Uses: headpieces, draping, backdrops, decorating tables, arches and much, much more.

entry.title: 60"x 10 Yards Pink Polka Dot Tulle Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5210
Type: Tulle
Price: 16.99

[About]

Material: Polyester Tulle (with trendy Polka dots.)
Width: 60"
Length: 10 Yards
Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
Color: Pink
The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
Perfect to wrap flowers, embellishments, or home decorations.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Delicate sheerness of soft tulle fabric has gorgeously been combined with peppy polka dot style to give you an exciting experience of crafting and decorations. Polka dots exude positive energy and vibes of merry feelings, giving the beholder a sprightly sight to behold and rejoice. Premium quality nylon tulle netting with stylish polka dotted accents throughout will give you one of a kind decorative accessory to add a dash of charm and style into your favors, arts, and crafts. Create captivating table and chair decorative accents, favor and gift wraps, bows and flowers, or add delicate adornments to your hair accessories and party outfits with this amazing bundle of charming elegance. 

Additional Information:

  • Material: Polyester Tulle (with trendy Polka dots.)
  • Width: 60" 
  • Length: 10 Yards 
  • Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
  • Color: Pink
  • Tulle can be used for headpieces, draping, backdrops, decorating tables, arches and much, much more.
  • The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
  • Perfect for to wrap flowers, embellishments, or home decorations.

[Information]

Add a dash of magic and mystery into your gifts, favors, craft creations, and decorations with this splendid sheer tulle fabric accented enchantingly with twinkling glitter patterns. Augment the elegance of your doting gifts and favors by swathing them with our gorgeous Elaborate Design Glitter Organza Tulle Fabric Rolls that is specially crafted to exude festive radiance and mystic charm. Craft mesmeric table and chair decorative accents, centerpiece and floral adornments, aisle and arch decorations, flowers and bows, and much more inspiring creation with our Elaborate Tulle Fabric. Create a style statement by adding glitz and glam to your gowns and apparels with this ethereal piece. 

Additional Information:

  • Material: 100% Nylon Material with Hints of Glitter
  • Width of Fabric: 6" Wide
  • Length of Fabric: 10 Yards 
  • Color: Royal Blue
  • Qty: 1 Roll/Order

  • Uses: Backdrops, Ceilings, Dress Making, Prom Dresses, Runners, Hanging Decor, DIY

entry.title: 17FT Extra Long 48" Two Layered Tulle & Satin Table Skirt - Champagne | White
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2240
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 31.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Skirt
Inner Fabric: Satin
Outer Fabric: Tulle
Color: Champagne | White
Length: 17 FT
Tulle Height: 48"
Satin Height: 30"
Top Satin Width: 2"
Style: Extra Long Tulle Table Skirt w/Satin Edge
All table skirts come with 1" velcro on top for attachment to clips. (Clips are sold separately)
Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

 

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Care Instructions: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Guideline to choosing the right size:

 

  • 14ft Skirts : Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended
  • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table
  • 21ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended

    Note: Sale is for Table Skirt only. Purchase Tablecloth for the top separately.

entry.title: 6" x 25 Yards Hunter Emerald Green Tulle Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5220
Type: Tulle
Price: 1.39

[About]

Material: 100% Polyester Tulle
Width of Fabric: 6" Wide
Length of Fabric: 25 Yards
Color: Hunter Emerald Green
Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
Feature: Soft, durable & lightweight
The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

These soft, sheer tulle fabric rolls are perfect to give an illusion effect to your wedding decors, pouches, favors and any other wild idea that crosses your mind with 6" x 25 Yards Hunter Emerald Green Tulle Fabric Bolt. These spools can be used to craft lavish dress or hair embellishments, shimmery sashes, and bows, tempting favors, or can be attached with balloons to enhance their charismatic charm. Tulle is widely admired and preferred as a number one embellishing accessory that will transform your dull celebration into an elegant one in an inexpensive manner.

Additional Information:

  • Material: 100% Polyester Tulle
  • Width of Fabric: 6" Wide
  • Length of Fabric: 25 Yards 
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green
  • Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
  • Feature: Soft, durable & lightweight
  • The #1 versatile material for weddings, showers and other special occasions.
  • Uses: Used for headpieces, draping, backdrops, decorating tables, arches and much, much more.

entry.title: 54" x 4 Yards Silver Psychedelic Design Beaded Sequin Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5210
Type: Fabrics
Price: 50.69

[About]

Material: Chemical Style Sequin Beads on top of Tulle Netting
Width: 54"
Length: 4 Yards
Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
Color: Silver
Edges are not finished
These fabric bolts are perfect for draping tables, ceilings, walls, and can also be used to fuel your own creativity.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

This gorgeously designed Psychedelic Chemical Sequin Style fabric is a sure way to spruce up any dreary decoration and ambiance. The astonishing embellishing elements of embroider, sequins and tulle netting have intricately been fused together to give this empyrean masterpiece. Enlivening interlocking web look has been created by embroidering in a spectacular manner. To glam up the visual appeal of this exquisite piece, our designers thought of studding it with shimmering beaded sequin fabric. The impeccable sheen and glamorous look of this superb sequin fabric bolt is heightened when you exhibit it with glinting LED effect or underneath the natural sunshine. Design swanky outfits for brides, bridesmaids, or flower girls to add an ethereal touch to your dressing line, or decorate your walls, ceilings, aisle, arches, and furniture with this classy material. The glitz and glam of your appearance and decor will surely impress your guests manifold who will be flabbergasted by the sublime aura of the event.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Chemical Style Sequin Beads on top of Tulle Netting
  • Width: 54" 
  • Length: 4 Yards 
  • Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
  • Color: Silver
  • Edges are not finished
  • These fabric bolts are perfect for draping tables, ceilings, walls, and can also be used to fuel your own creativity.
  • Uses: Backdrops, Dress Making, Prom Dresses, Runners, Hanging Decor, Draping Tables and Ceilings, DIY

entry.title: 17FT Mint Green 4 Layer Tulle Tutu Pleated Table Skirts
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2240
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 32.99

[About]

Qty: 1 Table Skirt
Material: Tulle
Lining Material: Cotton
Size: 17ft wide x 29" tall
No. of Tulle Layers: 4
Top Satin Width: 2"
All table skirts come with 1" velcro on top for attachment to clips. (Clips are sold separately)
Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

Jazz up your plain tablecloth by adding some pretty puffy tulle. The sheer fabric and divine softness of Tulle will impart a soft and dreamy feel to your party display. With the natural femininity and elegance held by Tulle, it has always been a top choice for girls of all ages.

Your birthday girl will simply love her birthday table dressed in matching tulle, complementing her fairy-like tutu. Whether it's a sweet 16 party, Quinceanera celebration, Bridal shower, baby shower, Holiday-themed parties or a wedding festivity, glam your dessert tables or cake tables with yards and yards of soft tulle, oozing the oodles of comeliness to your party space.

Besides parties and special events, you can use this Tulle Table Skirts to beautify your little girl's bedroom, wrapping a vanity, play table or a nightstand. Even your big girls desk will look amazingly adorable with lush tulle wrapped around it gracefully. Choose the size and color that matches with your room decor or with your events color scheme. With layers and layers of soft, sheer tulle tutu table skirt swathed around your wedding, reception, banquet, and party tables, your party will attain the highest level of delicate sophistication and surreal festive mood.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tulle
  • Measurements: 17ft wide x 29" tall
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Total 4 layers once skirt is fully fluffed
  • For 1 piece table skirt only. Tablecloth and decorations are not included.
  • All table skirts come with velcro on top for attachment to clips. (CLIPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY)
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquest, Restaurant Decoration

Guideline to choosing the right size:

  • 14ft Skirts : Covers 3 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 10 clips recommended.
  • 17ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 6ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table ( similar to the ones you find in Costco) - 15 clips recommended, Covers 3 sides on an 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table.
  • 21ft Skirts : Covers 4 sides on a 8ft x 2 1/2ft banquet table - 20 clips minimum needed - 24 clips recommended.
